nodes.bodyText: Please add @DeferredApi annotation to this method. It's needed for proper dynamic module loading that is upcoming across Firebase SDKs.

nodes.bodyText: It looks like this javadoc discourages use of this interface and then immediately suggests to use the same interface instead. Can you clarify the intent here?
nodes.diffHunk:

Provides an inter-operational interface only; instead, + * use {@link FidListener} to call a listener when a Fid changes.

nodes.bodyText: it looks equivalent to just making the whole method saynchronized, please consider doing that.

Looks like you're only supporting one listener at a time, I wonder if we want to allow multiple listeners, otherwise it may be surprising to clients that their listener is removed just because someone else registered a listener as well.
Should there be a way to "unregister" the listener? A common way to do it is to have the register method return a "registration" object, that has a remove() method.
